units.title: Seeding AF cells in Matrigel
units.text: To investigate formation of AFOs we seeded viable AF cells in Matrigel droplets and cultured them in an ad hoc-defined generic epithelial medium without tissue-specific signals (Supplementary Table 3).
units.rationale: Describes the initial culture step for generating amniotic fluid organoids.

units.title: Establishing clonal organoid lines
units.text: To establish clonal lines, individual AFOs were picked, dissociated into single cells and replated (Fig. 2a,b).
units.rationale: Provides a method for deriving clonal organoid cultures.

units.title: Intestinal ring formation assay
units.text: We performed an intestinal ring formation assay (Fig. 3i). Three hours after seeding, SiAFOs started fusing; by day 2 a more complex tubular budding structure had formed with full ring maturation at day 10.
units.rationale: Outlines a functional assay to assess intestinal organoid self‑organization.

units.title: EdU proliferation assay
units.text: 5-ethynyl-2'-deoxyuridine (EdU) incorporation indicated cell proliferation at the SiAFO crypt base (Fig. 3a).
units.rationale: Specifies the use of EdU labeling to measure proliferative activity.

units.title: Maturation of SiAFOs in intestinal medium
units.text: We then performed a maturation assay culturing SiAFOs in intestinal-specific medium for 14 d.
units.rationale: Details the culture condition used to mature small‑intestinal organoids.

units.title: Notch inhibition via DAPT and RT‑qPCR
units.text: quantitative reverse transcription PCR (RT–qPCR) following DAPT treatment demonstrated downregulation of Notch target genes (HES1 and OLFM4), stem/progenitor cells, Paneth cells and Wnt target genes (LGR5, LYZ and AXIN2).
units.rationale: Describes a pharmacological manipulation and downstream gene‑expression analysis.

units.title: Inulin‑FITC barrier integrity assay
units.text: Inulin-FITC assay performed on n = 7 expansion (CT) and differentiation (DIFF) medium (n = 4 independent biological samples) showed intact barrier integrity (no inulin-FITC uptake; *P = 0.0029, unpaired t-test).
units.rationale: Provides a functional test of epithelial barrier formation.

units.title: Differentiation of kidney organoids toward distal/collecting duct phenotype
units.text: we adapted a reported protocol to differentiate KAFOs toward a distal/collecting duct phenotype. After 14 d of vasopressin and arginine-aldosterone stimulation, KAFOs manifested markers of the collecting duct (AQP2) and distal tubules (SLC12A1 and CALB1).
units.rationale: Outlines a directed differentiation protocol for kidney organoids.

units.title: Derivation of lung organoids from CDH amniotic fluid and tracheal fluid
units.text: We derived lung organoids from both AF and TF of fetuses with severe/moderate CDH-related lung hypoplasia subjected to distal differentiation.
units.rationale: Specifies the source material and differentiation direction for disease‑model organoids.
